title: Amazon
summary: Drove KillSwitch design and implementation on the Access Engineering team. Reduced containment-to-remediation latency by 98%. Deployed KillSwitch to production using a multi-stage CI/CD pipeline configured by AWS CDK.

title: FollowUp
summary: A symptom-monitoring web application for Parkinson’s patients and neurologists.

title: Diversify: A Spotify Recommender
summary: Recommends the latest Spotify tracks from any country around the world. Leverages the KNN algorithm to rank tracks by similarity to user’s music taste.

title: Skin Cancer Image Segmentation
summary: Implemented a U-Net deep learning model consisting of recurrent residual convolutional neural networks. Achieved a 72% accuracy in identifying skin lesions in medical images.

title: Sneaker Central
summary: An interactive interface for shoe enthusiasts like myself.

title: Chinese Restaurant Redesign
summary: Redesigned a website belonging to a local Chinese restaurant to address flaws in its existing interface.

title: Shell
summary: C shell with a job control system that can execute built-in commands, handle input/output redirects, spawn child processes, run multiple processes in the background, as well as manage processes with signal forwarding.
